1001.title: Message from Mimtastic
1001.content: Admin, Admin! Your Swig storage is bursting at the seams! Hurry up and give your combat team some missions, or Mimir will get lazy!

1002.title: Message from Mininja
1002.content: Sorry to bother you, Admin. I noticed the Mimir system's Swig storage is full and thought I should inform you.

1003.title: Message from Mitir
1003.content: Admin, Swig storage is at capacity. Message ends.

2001.title: Message from Mimtastic
2001.content: Admin, Admin! You've got unclaimed Novice Sign-in supplies. Don't forget to pick them up.

3001.title: Message from Mimtastic
3001.content: Admin, Admin! You've got unclaimed C-Obs supplies. Don't forget to pick them up.

4001.title: Message from Mimir
4001.content: The Mimir system would like to kindly remind you that there is a Swigs Pack to be claimed.

5001.title: Message from Mimir
5001.content: M.E.O.W. exploration complete. Back to the Observation Post now.

6001.title: Message from Mi.UU
6001.content: Restaurant job complete. Go and see what the exploration squad has brought back!

7001.title: Message from Mi.UU
7001.content: Park Stamps gained from the restaurant is about to overload the cashier! Log in to claim them!
